alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Geauga, Lake and northern Ashtabula Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 619 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Geneva-On-The-Lake to 7 miles northwest of Fairport Harbor to 11 miles west of Euclid. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Conneaut, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Euclid, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Timberlake, Lakeline, Wickliffe, Willoughby Hills and Mentor-On-The-Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake
